name: semantic-tagger
description: A build pipeline task to add a timestamp pre-release tag to a semantic version.
author: Matthew de Beer

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Semantic version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a version number to be tagged. Must adhere to the [Semantic Versioning 2.0 Standard](https://semver.org/).

inputs.name: onExistingTag
inputs.label: On existing tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the provided version already contains a pre-release tag, how should it be handled?

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Pre-release tag prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide an optional prefix for the pre-release tag. May only contain alphanumerics and hyphens and as such does not support multiple identifiers as described in SemVer V2. If left blank, tags will be prefixed with _alpha_.

inputs.name: setBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set Build Number to tagged version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally set the Build Number to the version once it's tagged.
